original_text: I tell you this, King Belshazzar. The powerful God who rules over everything gave authority to your father, Nebuchadnezzar, to rule as king. God made him very great and very famous, so that he ruled with power. People respected him as a great king.
korean_text: 왕이여 지극히 높으신 하나님이 왕의 부친 느부갓네살에게 나라와 큰 권세와 영광과 위엄을 주셨고

sentences.original_text: I tell you this, King Belshazzar.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이것을 네게 말하노라, 벨사살 왕이여.

sentences.original_text: The powerful God who rules over everything
gave authority to your father, Nebuchadnezzar,
God made him very great and very famous,
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그를 매우 위대하고 유명하게 만드셨으며

sentences.original_text: so that he ruled with power.
People respected him as a great king.
